<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}

  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Authenticates a user with email and password, returns JWT token and user profile

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["email","password"],"properties":{"email":{"type":"string","format":"email","example":"john.doe@mydomain.com"},"password":{"type":"string","format":"password","example":"iLovePria123"}},"title":"SignInRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
